Package table

Class CustomersManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • table.CustomersManager
  • public class CustomersManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages application CRUD operations for the Customers table in the database.

    See Also:
    Customer

        Static method to get an ObservableList of all Customers from the database.

        Returns:
        ObservableList of all customers

      • getCustomer

        public static Customer getCustomer​(int customerId)
        Static method to get a single customer from the database.

        Parameters:
        customerId - the ID number for the Customer requested from the database
        Returns:
        the Customer or null(not found)

      • addCustomer

        public static boolean addCustomer​(Customer customer)
        Static method to add a customer to the database.

        Parameters:
        customer - Customer Object to add to the database
        Returns:
        true/false if the Customer was added to the database

      • updateCustomer

        public static boolean updateCustomer​(Customer customer)
        Static method to update a customer in the database.

        Parameters:
        customer - Customer Object to update in the database
        Returns:
        true/false if the Customer was updated in the database

      • deleteCustomer

        public static boolean deleteCustomer​(int customerId)
        Static method to delete a customer from the database. Checks that the customer does not have any scheduled appointments prior to deletion.

        Parameters:
        customerId - Customer's ID number to delete from the database
        Returns:
        true/false if the Customer was deleted from the database
